lines.text: Grandmother! You wave a mean wand, don't you old girl?
[singing on stage at the night club]

All the chicks in town are crazy for a certain burly wolf/ A real sharp curly, curly wolf/ Whose line is oh so smooth when he spreads it on!/ Oh so smooth, he's in the groove/ Where lovin' is a cinch/ And all the babes in town trail him around/ Just to hold his paw and say... / Oh, wolfie! Oh, wolfie!/ Ain't you the one?/ Oh, wolfie! Oh, wolfie!/ Ain't we go fun?
